rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment states a factual low risk ('will not enter the food system').
The segment discusses future/planned actions ('will also be quarantined and killed off') and uses a plain verb ('detected').
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment contains a bare negation ('will not enter') and is handled under Q7.
Segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast.
